headline: NRG Energy vs. Palantir: Which of These Top-Performing S&P 500 Stocks is the Better Buy
summary: NRG Energy's utility makeover and strategic acquisitions fuel 2025 gains yet derivatives risks remain.  Palantir's AI software boom has delivered stunning profits but carries a sky-high valuation.  As the S&P 500 moves more cautiously in 2025, two companies have distinguished themselves with impressive gains.
